{{otheruses4|the phenomenon in Raven's Bluff|the spell|Wildfire (spell)}}
'''Wildfire''' was a peculiar [[wild magic]] phenomenon observed in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] in which an individual suddenly displayed the ability to use [[magic]] when placed in dangerous situations, albeit uncontrolled and in a chaotic fashion.
document_data.Description: It manifested only once or twice a year in a small portion of the residents, known as wildfire-wielders. People who exhibited signs of wildfire were always native residents of Ravens Bluff who had no formal training in the arcane arts. The warlord [[Myrkyssa Jelan]] discovered the reason for this: a wild [[mythal]], built by the [[dark elf|dark elves]] below the city. The mythal's magic seeped into the air, earth, and water surrounding Ravens Bluff, and was the source of wildfire.
